channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fentanyl smuggling into the U.S. fell during the Biden administration, study finds
item.description: A new study indicates the amount of fentanyl being smuggled into the U.S. fell dramatically during the Biden administration.

item.title: Thrift Store. Clinic. Roller Rink. Center Becomes ‘Radical’ Lifeline Amid Homelessness, Drug Crises.
item.description: Located in the Lower 9th Ward, this abandoned building has become a community sanctuary and resource.

item.title: Why is the U.S. pulling out of 31 U.N. groups? And what's the impact?
item.description: The Trump administration is withdrawing from 66 global groups, including U.N. entities that focus on climate and health issues.
